title: Sash, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Long narrow strip of cotton forming a sash, turban, or hanging. Patterned with repeats of geometric shapes (including "tumpal" motif at ends) arranged symmetrically--the center line being in the middle of the length--but the halves are not exactly identical. Tan pattern on a dark blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sash, early 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1976-7-1.
